RelatedSentence: Diplomats of Muslim countries from the Middle East and North Africa based in Dhaka yesterday reaffirmed their governments ' commitment to enhance cooperation with Bangladesh and expressed their confidence that Bangladesh would continue to maintain its sound momentum of growth and development .

RelatedSentence: Diplomats of Muslim countries from the Middle East and North Africa based in Dhaka yesterday reaffirmed their governments ' commitment to enhance cooperation with Bangladesh and expressed their confidence that Bangladesh would continue to maintain its sound momentum of growth and development .
The remarks were made by 12 envoys of the member states of the Organisation of Islamic Conference at a briefing , organised by the foreign ministry at state guesthouse Padma .
